page.title: 12HACKLINGE AREA HEALTH
page.content: {Health. There are no Doctors' or Dentists' practices here but there are both in Deal and Sandwich. Doctors will make house calls but patients are mostly seen by appointment at the surgeries. There is a full medical centre at the Colliery which helps those nearby. A District Nurse comes from Deal when needed. Hospitals are at Canterbury and Deal. The W.V.S. Meals-on-Wheels takes mid-day meals to those in need of the service and Home-Helps are available when necessary. {Transport. Buses run each way along the A258 every two hours but services start late and finish early. There are no Sunday services. 80% of residents have cars and many ride bicycles, mopeds and motorbikes but it is difficult for those without their own transport.
